text: Mohamed Abdel-Latif "Mimi" El-Sherbini (26 July 1938 â€“ 20 January 2025) was an Egyptian footballer. He played as a defender. He played for the Egyptian national team from 1958 to 1969. He also represented his country in the 1960 and 1964 Summer Olympics. El-Sherbini died on 20 January 2025 at a hospital in Mansoura, Egypt from problems caused by Alzheimer's disease at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Egyptian footballers
title: Mimi El-Sherbini
